title: Hustle and Flow[2005]DvDrip[Eng]-theRARjnzo
description:
theRARjnzo
"Helping those who want a simple, easy, free, movies viewing expirience"

The ONLY uploads i do is to IMPROVE on DvDrips already posted. Whether that may be CONVERTING a .rar to .avi,
COMBINING a &#039;2 disc video file&#039; from 2 .avi&#039;s into 1 to make it EASIER for downloaders, or
the SLIGHT possibility of a custom DvDrip if there really aren&#039;t any .torrent files of a film out there

This is an .avi file. The original upload was by DiAMOND which was split into 2 .avi files, or 2 sets of .rar files
depending on which torrent you download it from.
this upload is ONLY for those who don&#039;t understand how to use winrar or are scared it may contain a virus or some
other malicious software and/or ONLY for those who are just bothered by fact that they have to keep track of 2 .avi files
and need to switch from one to the other in the middle of the movie.

The AC3 Filter provided may be need in order to view this movie, so please make sure to run the ac3filter_1_46.exe
before viewing.

Again, i&#039;m not trying to steal any credit, i&#039;m just trying to make it easier for those who are less technologically
gifted in the .torrent world.

-Enjoy the show :)
